Package org.qqq175.it_academy.jd1.hw2

Home work 2 - Control Flow Statements

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalculateNumbersSum
    Calculates sum of first n numbers.
    CalculateSomeSequenceSum
    Calculates sequence sum (1 +1/2 + 1/3 + 1/4 +....)/
    Calculator
    Console menu calculator.
    CheckWeight
    Check your weight
    CompareTwoNumbers
    Read two numbers from console, compare it and print result.
    DateToDay
    Calculate day of week by date.
    DayOfWeek
    Class convert number of the day to it's name.
    DivideNumbers
    Divide one number by another number
    Factorial
    Calculate a factorial of number
    FormulaTable
    Print table y = 2*x^2 - 5*x - 8 for x from -4 to 4 (step is 0.5)
    LeapYear
    Read an year and determine whether it is a leap year.
    PrintMyRubles
    Gets the amount of 1 to 999 rubles and outputs it with the currency in correct case
    SplitString
    Split the string to two parts and print it
    SqrTable
    Calculate and print table of squares of numbers from 1 to 10
